data.comment: The big names in today's match at Arena do Gremio have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 1, Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Gremio.
Throw-in Palmeiras.
Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Gremio have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, Gremio to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 10, Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Palmeiras.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 13, Free kick Gremio.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Gremio.
At Arena do Gremio, Gabriel Menino has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 16, Lucas Silva for Gremio drives towards goal at Arena do Gremio. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
Can Gremio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Palmeiras's half?
In the minute 18, Victor Ferraz (Gremio) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 20, Palmeiras's Weverton looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Weverton for Palmeiras who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In Porto Alegre Palmeiras attack through Danilo Dos Santos De Oliveira. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 22, It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
Free kick Palmeiras.
Victor Ferraz (Gremio) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Gremio in the half of Palmeiras.
In Porto Alegre, Diego Souza of Gremio is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
In the minute 28, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Palmeiras at Arena do Gremio.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 31, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Gremio.
Matheus Henrique is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Gremioâ€™s Matheus Henrique is on his feet again at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 33, In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Free kick Gremio.
In the minute 35, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Gremio.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in Gremio.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Gremio drive upfield and Alisson gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Palmeiras defender.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
In the minute 40, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gremio push forward at Arena do Gremio and Alisson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Palmeiras defence.
Important block from the Gremio defence as Gabriel Menino fires in a strike for Palmeiras.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Gremio throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Gremio have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira.
Victor Ferraz (Gremio) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Palmeiras's Rony gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gremio defender.
The away team have replaced Gabriel Menino with Bruno Henrique. This is the first substitution made today by Vanderlei Luxemburgo.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Gremio.
Palmeiras's Ramires gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gremio defender.
In the minute 48, Palmeiras drive forward but Gustavo Gomez is judged offside.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Gremio capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 49, Palmeiras's Felipe Melo has been booked in Porto Alegre.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Gremio.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 52, In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Matheus Henrique (Gremio) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 54, Goal kick for Palmeiras at Arena do Gremio.
Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gremio have a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Free kick Gremio.
Gremio have a dangerous throw-in.
Palmeiras's Ramires gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 57, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira awards Gremio a goal kick.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Rony.
In the minute 60, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
The away team has substituted Rony with Gabriel Veron. Vanderlei Luxemburgo is thus making his second change.
Palmeiras's Danilo Dos Santos De Oliveira breaks free at Arena do Gremio. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
In the minute 62, Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
Free kick for Gremio in the half of Palmeiras.
Throw-in for Gremio close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Palmeiras.
In the minute 64, Ferreira is replacing Lucas Silva for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 65, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a Gremio throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bruno Henrique of Palmeiras gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 67, Gremio have a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Free kick Palmeiras.
Vanderlei Luxemburgo is making the team's third substitution at Arena do Gremio with Luiz Adriano replacing Willian.
Vanderlei Luxemburgo (Palmeiras) is making a fourth substitution, with Wesley replacing Ramires.
Gremio are pushing forward but Alisson's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 70, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 71, Raphael Veiga is on target to give Palmeiras a 0-1 advantage.
Matias Vina with an assist there.
Important block from the Palmeiras defence as Darlan Mendes fires in a strike for Gremio.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Gremio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 75, Goal kick for Palmeiras at Arena do Gremio.
The home team have replaced Darlan Mendes with Isaque. This is the second substitution made today by Renato Gaucho.
Gremio are coming forward and Isaque gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 77, Palmeiras have a goal kick.
Palmeiras drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 79, In Porto Alegre, Wesley of Palmeiras is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 80, Renato Gaucho (Gremio) is making a third substitution, with Guilherme Azevedo replacing Robinho.
Palmeiras needs to be cautious. Gremio have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Gremio in the half of Palmeiras.
Matias Vina is booked for the away team.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
In the minute 83, Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
Throw-in for Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 85, Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Palmeiras.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 87, Vitor Hugo is replacing Raphael Veiga for the away team.
In the minute 88, In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Wesley of Palmeiras smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Palmeiras push upfield but Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 89, Gremio push forward at Arena do Gremio and Isaque gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Palmeiras defence.
Rodrigo D'alonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
At Arena do Gremio the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
That's full-time at Arena do Gremio. The final score is 1-1.
Alisson (Gremio) has received a first yellow card.
Ferreira (Gremio) nets with a header to make it 1-1 at Arena do Gremio.
Great play from Alisson to set up the goal.
